Barefaced Perfectionist

Brand: bareFaced Mineral Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Jojoba Esters, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Tridecyl Stearate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extr

aria Ochroleuca Extract, Tocopherol, Squalane, Bisabolol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
